Section_2.title: Career
Section_2.p_1: Following my initial experiences in the web industries, where I designed e-commerce solutions, I embarked on a career as a full-stack developer at a digital communication agency. Over time, I had the opportunity to lead a team in developing web solutions for major national brands such as Paluani, Borsalino, Bertazzoni, and Fedrigoni. All projects were built with Drupal, a powerful and versatile open-source CMS. I also actively participated in the community, contributing to its development and attending national and international events.
Section_2.p_2: During this period, I gained comprehensive experience in managing digital projects: I handled client relationships, implemented and managed web infrastructure using Amazon Web Services (AWS), and paid special attention to UI and SEO design.
Section_2.p_3: Today, I am a web/mobile developer at Intesys, a company that has been part of the Lynx group since 2025. As a member of the front-end team, I work daily on projects for the Industrial and Fintech sectors, primarily using React, Typescript, and Next.js in headless projects with third-party integrations.
Section_2.p_4: In parallel, I have a passion for sharing my knowledge and experience in the field by teaching full-stack web development at the ITS Digital Academy, where I pass on skills, methodologies, and best practices to the next generation of developers.
Section_2.skill_1: Platforms: Drupal, Strapi, Payload CMS, BigCommerce, HubSpot
Section_2.skill_2: Infrastructure: Amazon Web Services, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub / GitLab
